history.content:
You're already responding to posts on Piazza and checking the facebook groups, why not become a Department Peer Adviser? 

Our peer advisers are the first point of contact for students when visiting our offices. They provide advice, support, and motivation to students on a broad range of topics and issues including: student involvement, registration information, major requirements, research opportunities, internship searches, and much more. We believe that a student's perspective is valuable in helping other students make decisions about life at Cal. 

Please see attached application: Peer_Adviser_App.pdf
history.subject: Be a Peer Adviser to EECS and L&S CS Students
